title: Microsoft's Open-Source Pivot Is Creating a Great Place to Work
body: Microsoft isn't just building for the future. The company is focusing on tools that will allow an ever-broader group of people to program for themselves.

title: Bolt-On Security the Linux Way
body: In this piece, I aim to provide a range of simple but effective options for encrypting a small number of files.

title: Autonomous Cars + IoT, and Life or Death Decisions
body: An ecosystem is being created where cars and robots are autonomous and connected so they will be able to connect to other devices, sensors, and data repositories available to them.

title: Once the Big Tech Battler, Open Source Is Now Big Tech's Battleground
body: A cadre of tech giants have created the Rust Foundation.

title: It's Time to Consider 3D Printed Homes
body: This emerging building method is far less wasteful, far faster, and far cheaper to build much sturdier homes. The only real downside is that the skills and technology to build these houses aren't widely available yet.
